item.title: 15 Essential AI Coding Assistant Features That Boost Developer Productivity
item.description:
15 Essential AI Coding Assistant Features That Boost Developer Productivity Link to heading

AI-powered coding tools—such as GitHub Copilot and Cursor AI— are revolutionizing the development workflow by offering intelligent assistance for writing, debugging, and optimizing code. In this article, we’ll explore the main features provided by these tools, using Golang examples to demonstrate their practical applications.

Modern developers face increasing pressure to deliver high-quality code faster. AI coding assistants have emerged as powerful allies in this challenge, offering features that automate repetitive tasks, suggest improvements, and catch errors before they cause problems. Let’s explore the 15 most impactful features that are changing how developers work.
